page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT IN PERTH
page.content:
Compared to other cities in Scotland, Perth has a fairly high rate of employment, with most of the jobs being at tertiary level. The{GENERAL {ACCIDENT INSURANCE COMPANY}alone provides over{1,000}jobs. The whisky trade also employs a large workforce with four major companies, {BELLS, DEWARS, PETER THOMPSON}and {GLOAGS,}all with branches in Perth. As Perth is a major tourist centre, the hotel business provides a large amount of seasonal employment for all age groups. Many firms in the city centre operate a{YOUTH TRAINING SCHEME,}but for more permanent situations, prospective employers tend to look for more experience in applicants.
